SELECT S.idSucursal, S.numeroUnicoSucursal, S.nombre AS nombre, S.estado AS estado, S.calle AS calle, S.numero AS numero,
C.nombre AS nombreColonia, C.codigo_postal AS codigoPostal, M.nombre AS nombreMunicipio, E.nombre AS nombreEstado
FROM PacketWorld.sucursal AS S
LEFT JOIN mexico.colonias AS C ON S.idColonia = C.id
LEFT JOIN mexico.municipios AS M ON C.municipio = M.id
LEFT JOIN mexico.estados AS E ON M.estado = E.id
WHERE S.estado = 'Activa'
ORDER BY S.idSucursal;
